segments.text: The sheer amount of water on the floor is starting to bother me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flowing over the cabinet doors, saturating the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the swelling and warping that will occur.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of potential mold growth from the dampness is quite unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame to see such a functional kitchen being ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness from the adult is particularly frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation just feels so messy and avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the tidy garden visible outside the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost smell the damp wood and stagnant water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This will require a lot of cleaning and repairs later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sense of neglect, even if accidental, is disheartening.
segments.speaker: PAR
